title: Enes Kanter Freedom: ‘The Chinese Communist Party does not represent Olympic core values’
description: Enes Kanter Freedom, a center for the Boston Celtics and an outspoken critic of the leaders of Turkey and China, joins Chuck to talk about how he became focused on human rights and the Beijing Winter Olympics.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: Enes Kanter Freedom, a center for the Boston Celtics and an outspoken critic of the leaders of Turkey and China, joins Chuck to talk about how he became focused on human rights and the Beijing Winter Olympics.
